climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Nordic Swan Ecolabel certified products meet requirements on chemical usage, resource consumption, greenhouse gas emissions and biodiversity.

features: GOOD FOR BABIES: Totally Chrlorine Free, Super soft and comfy, our diapers are enhanced with organic cotton, perfect for delicate newborn skin. With only plant-based materials against your baby’s bottom, our dermatologically tested, allergy-certified diapers are made without fragrance, chlorine bleaching, lotion, parabens, natural rubber latex and phthalates.

PERFECT FOR NEWBORNS: Our diapers feature a special umbilical cord cut-out, contoured to protect the delicate belly area. They also feature a handy color-changing wetness indicator, so you know when it’s time for a diaper change!

GOOD FOR THE PLANET: Pura’s EU EcoLabel accredited diapers are manufactured in a carbon neutral plant, powered by green electricity. Where possible, we’ve replaced non-sustainable materials with lower impact materials such as wood pulp from sustainably managed forests in the absorbent core of our diapers. Our packaging is made from paper, so it's easier to recycle!
TRUSTED BY PARENTS: Made in the EU to the highest standards, Pura diapers have won multiple awards, voted for by real parents.
USING BUSINESS FOR GOOD: Pura is a certified B-Corp and a Carbon Neutral business.
body.description: We set out to create a high performance, low environmental impact diaper that doesn’t compromise on skin safety, comfort or value for money. Approved by dermatologists to be gentle on sensitive, newborn skin, our diapers feature an umbilical cut-out to protect the delicate belly area and a handy color changing wetness indicator. Organic cotton enhanced, with plant-based materials against babies’ skin, they’re luxuriously soft and verified by Allergy UK as skin-safe as well as EU Ecolabel verified to have a low environmental impact. Meet the Pura family Pura didn’t start in a boardroom. It was born in the British home of Guy and Abi Fennell. Created by parents, for parents, Pura was founded to make clean, safe and planet-friendly products affordable for all. Pura is a Carbon Neutral business and a certified B-Corp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are better than the big brands
reviews.reviewText: First if all I am writing this because it important to share something that is safe and effective. These diapers are so much soft the are cotton filled and not full of plastics and gel like the regular big name brands. I was using Costco diapers but I wanted a better cleaner more natural diaper. These do not have the line that shows when it's wet quite frankly I don't care or need it you can tell when it's wet the cotton will swell and it's obvious. They hold big blow outs better than those name brands, my daughter 6 months old now is sleeping 6 plus hrs because they hold so well at night and keep her dry. They also havnt not given her rashes I am sure uts because they are cotton. I LOVE these diapers and affordable to my for the fact that they are so much safer than those big brands. Try then you won't be disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars After 4 kids, best diapers I have ever purchased.
reviews.reviewText: I have four children and have used every brand of diapers under the sun- Pampers, Huggies, Luvs, Walmart brand, Kroger brand, CVS brand, Aldi brand, Hello Bello- to name a few. Of all these brands, this brand Pura is the most absorbent I have ever used. I used them for the first time with this purchase and they did not leak one time overnight, as nearly every other brand has. I only purchased them because I needed diapers delivered next day and these did so it was totally by chance I used them but I will almost solely rely on them because of how well they worked for overnight use on my children. (I have three under 3, two in diapers full time, one in diapers at night only). These truly were a game changer for night time, held up all night with no leaks. They are soft, comfortable and honestly well worth the money and I definitely am one to try and get the best deal on anything as a parent. Beyond pleased, highly recommend, new favorite diapers for my kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have used clean diapers for my 2 year old from the start but a lot of the brands have changed their ingredients and I searched and searched for a better option. I tried a ton of different brands and these are hands down the best. We had a ton of problems with leaks with other diapers but my son hasn't leaked once since we started these diapers. I was hesitant because I saw a few reviews stated that they don't have any absorbency and there were issues with leaking but we haven't had the same experience, these are the best! We started out with just using them overnight and they would be so full in the morning when my son would wake but the diapers hold up so well! They absorb everything and he isn't wet at all. After failing at trying to find a clean/non toxic diaper or even pull up that we loved we decided to use these during the daytime as well and we haven't looks back. They are the softest diapers we have tried as well. My son hasn't gotten any rashes with them either. Hands down the best we have tried. We are crossing our fingers the Pura training pants will be available in the US when we start potty training. Highly recommend these diapers!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: When my little girl was born we started to use Pampers swaddle. It worked well but it was smelling little chemical. Then I saw this brand. I thought it will be better because it says most of chemical free, cotton, no diaper rash... I used Pampers and Pura both to finish Pampers. I didn't see nothing different. After finished Pampers just I used Pura. And after 1-2 day I saw diaper rash on my little girls skin. I am using cream to heal them but nothing worked her skin has redness because of this diaper. It smells chemical still. Also I subscribed it. When the next delivery time came price increased almost 15$ suddenly. I canceled my subscription and also I won't use Pura anymore. It didn't work for me and was a bad experience. I don't suggest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Soft, runs small
reviews.reviewText: My baby is about 28lbs and size 4 is very small on him. I'd size up if you're reaching the end of the weight range! we had a leak overnight but I don't think it'd be an issue if we had the right size; they seem absorbent enough. very soft, premium quality diapers :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not very absorbent
reviews.reviewText: I like that these are TCF and very soft but the inner layer is very thin meaning twice as many diaper changes. Not the best for the environment or overnight absorbency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect diaper!
reviews.reviewText: My trusted diaper just disconnected their diaper line and I was so bummed! I trialed a few different options and these were easily the best AND so much more affordable than what I had been using! My son’s skin breaks out from most diapers even many TCF and fragrance free ones. This diaper is sooo soft and he’s never had a breakout from them. Also they last through the night - no leaks :) they check all the boxes! I wish I had found them sooner! We did size up from the chart to be totally leak free. My son is 22 lbs and we are in size 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST diapers!
reviews.reviewText: These diapers are crunchy mamas dream! I don't understand why they aren't rated 5 stars! Totally chlorine free and organic cotton! They are so soft I joke and say that we are cloth diapering..but seriously it's like wrapping your baby's bum in a cloud! They do run a bit small so I would recommend buying a small pack and making sure the size is right. The diaper is a bit wider than a normal diaper so don't be a knucklehead make sure you apply and fasten it correctly. They are extremely absorbent so if leaks are happening, hate to say it but, user error. These diapers are honestly perfect. Not to be confused with honest brand diapers. Those are booty, pun intended. Now go place your order!
